Posts.Content: I had my DIEP flap surgery back in 2010, I have noticed that in my lower abdominal area, I have a bulge on my right side.  I feel pulling sometimes and stiffness I was wondering if anyone has experienced this also.
Posts.Title: Diep flap side effects

Posts.Content: Sorry I meant bulges not blushes.  I don't want to confuse anyone.
Posts.Title: Diep flap side effects

Posts.Content: Have you discussed this with your Dr., if so what do they say is the reason for this. I am curious cause my Dr. said it was just fat. I was thinking of getting a second opinion. I was also wondering if people who have this surgery have a mesh placed in there abdomen automatically. I actually have 2 blushes one in the lower left and one that just developed in the upper right.
Posts.Title: Diep flap side effects

Posts.Content: Has anyone gone to see a Hernia specialist, and actually had the surgery.  I wanted to see if I could find a good Hernia specialist either in the New York area or in Bergen county New Jersey.  I want to make sure I find a good Dr.  Does anyone have any recommendations.  I would truly appreciate it. Thank you Marth
